Parameter.name: MANIFEST_FILENAME
Parameter.Description: The name of the manifest file in which al the subcases for the test ar being kept. Manifest files are stored in the '/scripts/' sub-folder of the Graphics/TC folder.

Parameter.name: RESULT_FILENAME
Parameter.Description: Name of the .csv file that will store the results in CSV format

Parameter.name: REMOVE_PARAMS
Parameter.Description: Binaries and files that are to be removed after the test has ran. This parameter is optional because it is a workaround until the UNISTALL_FILE TestStep is reviewed and usable. Multiple parameters can be served, separated by a ";".

Parameter.name: FEATURE_NAME
Parameter.Description: Name of the feature under test.

Parameter.name: DIAG_PARAMETER
Parameter.Description: Diag options for the oglconform binary. Multiple parameters can be served, separated by a ";".

Parameter.name: TEST_PARAMETER
Parameter.Description: Test options for features that also require a specific test for the oglconform conformance. Multiple parameters can be served, separated by a ";".

Parameter.name: KHRONOS_PARAMETER
Parameter.Description: xml manifest file containing the subcase(s) needed to be run this conformance to pass. Manifest files are stored in the '/scripts/' sub-folder of the Graphics/TC folder.

Parameter.name: REMOVE_PARAMS
Parameter.Description: Binaries and files that are to be removed after the test has ran. This parameter is optional because it is a workaround until the UNISTALL_FILE TestStep is reviewed and usable. Multiple parameters can be served, separated by a ";".

Parameter.name: CERT_MODE
Parameter.Description: This parameter makes the difference between running all of the conformance tests for EGL 1.4 API level or single test(s) run. If "True", all of the tests will be generated and ran. If "False", certain parameters only will be taken into consideration.

Parameter.name: FEATURE_NAME
Parameter.Description: Name of the feature under test.

Parameter.name: DIAG_PARAMETER
Parameter.Description: Diag options for the oglconform binary. Multiple parameters can be served, separated by a ";".

Parameter.name: TEST_PARAMETER
Parameter.Description: Test options for features that also require a specific test for the oglconform conformance. Multiple parameters can be served, separated by a ";".

Parameter.name: KHRONOS_PARAMETER
Parameter.Description: xml manifest file containing the subcase(s) needed to be run this conformance to pass. Manifest files are stored in the '/scripts/' sub-folder of the Graphics/TC folder.

Parameter.name: CERT_MODE
Parameter.Description: xml manifest file containing the subcase(s) needed to be run this conformance to pass. Manifest files are stored in the '/scripts/' sub-folder of the Graphics/TC folder.

Parameter.name: REMOVE_PARAMS
Parameter.Description: Binaries and files that are to be removed after the test has ran. This parameter is optional because it is a workaround until the UNISTALL_FILE TestStep is reviewed and usable. Multiple parameters can be served, separated by a ";".

Parameter.name: DEVICE_LOGDIR
Parameter.Description: xml manifest file containing the subcase(s) needed to be run this conformance to pass. Manifest files are stored in the '/scripts/' sub-folder of the Graphics/TC folder.

Parameter.name: RUN_TYPE
Parameter.Description: xml manifest file containing the subcase(s) needed to be run this conformance to pass. Manifest files are stored in the '/scripts/' sub-folder of the Graphics/TC folder.

Parameter.name: CERT_MODE
Parameter.Description: xml manifest file containing the subcase(s) needed to be run this conformance to pass. Manifest files are stored in the '/scripts/' sub-folder of the Graphics/TC folder.

Parameter.name: SINGLE_TEST_PARAM
Parameter.Description: This is the string parameter containing a single test line that the user wants included

Parameter.Description: xml manifest file containing the subcase(s) needed to be run this conformance to pass. Manifest files are stored in the '/scripts/' sub-folder of the Graphics/TC folder.

Parameter.name: LOCAL_PULL_PATH
Parameter.Description: xml manifest file containing the subcase(s) needed to be run this conformance to pass. Manifest files are stored in the '/scripts/' sub-folder of the Graphics/TC folder.

Parameter.name: LIBGUI_TEST
Parameter.Description: The specific test to be ran using the libgui_test utility.
